context_bundle.summary: Timeout & deadlock error patterns in multi-agent coordination. Causes: Agent unresponsive, circular dependencies, file lock contention. Solutions: Timeout policies, watchdogs, deadlock detection, circuit breakers.

onboarding.quick_start: Timeout = agent doesn't respond within deadline. Deadlock = circular wait (A waits for B, B waits for A). Solutions: Set timeouts on all waits, watchdog monitors, detect cycles in dependency graph, circuit breaker fails fast.
common_patterns: Watchdog: Monitor last-modified timestamp, kill if stale
Circuit breaker: After N failures, skip agent, continue workflow
Deadlock detection: Cycle detection in task graph
Retry with backoff: Exponential delay between attempts

known_errors.solution: Add timeout to all file waits, implement watchdog
known_errors.prevention: Default 60s timeout on all coordination points
